email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider coming down to the mid-40s, say $48.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $48.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. However, I can offer $49.75 per metric ton as a compromise. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $49.75 is more reasonable, but we’d like to lock in at $49.00 if possible. Also, can we confirm the laycan remains October 15-20? Lastly, could you provide the vessel’s full specs for our records? Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $49.00 per metric ton, provided we finalize today. The laycan is confirmed for October 15-20. Attached are the full specs for the MV Ocean Star, including its DWT, LOA, and other relevant details. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. We’re happy to proceed at $49.00 per metric ton. Please send over the contract for review, and we’ll finalize by end of day. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ve attached the contract for your review. Let me know if there are any issues. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best regards, Sarah.
